name: rjs-utf
description: Rudimentary JS Unit Test Framework (the challenge)

scripts.prep-tests:
rm -fr reports/; mkdir reports/; mkdir reports/eslint/; mkdir reports/junit/; echo "Reports
---" > reports/README.md; echo "Unit tests results
---" > reports/junit/README.md;  echo "eslint results
---" > reports/eslint/README.md
scripts._eslint: npm run aliases; OUT='./reports/eslint/eslint.txt'; date > $OUT; eslint src/*.js >> $OUT; eslint ./*.js >> $OUT; eslint tests/specs/*.js >> $OUT; echo "DONE!"
scripts._junit: npm run prep-tests; npm run aliases; jasmine-node --junitreport --growl tests/specs/; mv reports/*.xml reports/junit/; git checkout tests/props/*.*
scripts._coverage: rm -fr reports/coverage/; npm run aliases; ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover --include-all-sources -x "**src/sign-test.*" ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node tests/specs/; rm -fr reports/coverage/; mv coverage reports/; git checkout tests/props/*.*

author: Martin Swiderski
